context_bundle.summary: AutoHotkey v2.0 integration pattern for Windows MCP send_keys failures. Use AHK scripts instead of direct PowerShell SendKeys for reliable window activation and text injection.

onboarding.quick_start: When Windows MCP send_keys fails: 1) write_file → create .ahk script, 2) execute_powershell → Start-Process script.ahk, 3) AHK handles window targeting
common_patterns: write_file: C:\Temp\script.ahk with AHK v2.0 content
AHK pattern: if WinExist('ahk_exe target.exe') { WinActivate; Sleep 500; SendText message; Send '{Enter}' }
known_errors: PowerShell SendKeys has window focus race conditions
CreateDelegate errors when using complex window enumeration
Direct SendKeys unreliable for VS Code and terminal windows
